message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first because I think it could be really valuable for you. I'm looking for a price around $20,000 to make it worthwhile for me. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $16,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can offer $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
